name: Dreamers (itch) (karanva)
description:
Dreamers is an experiment.

The prototypes are two versions of the same game with a single difference between them :D

If you want to try it I recommend playing dreamers.zip first, and then dreamers_wall.zip :) but if you only want to play 1 then play the second

Also, play at your own risk ;) and yes! you will most likely be confused.
